<file>
00001| // CRITICAL DEV CACHE CLEARING SCRIPT
00002| (function() {
00003|   'use strict';
00004|   
00005|   console.log('[CACHE-CLEAR] Starting aggressive cache clearing...');
00006|   
00007|   // Clear all possible storage
00008|   try {
00009|     if (typeof localStorage !== 'undefined') {
00010|       localStorage.clear();
00011|       console.log('[CACHE-CLEAR] localStorage cleared');
00012|     }
00013|   } catch (e) {
00014|     console.warn('[CACHE-CLEAR] localStorage clear failed:', e);
00015|   }
00016|   
00017|   try {
00018|     if (typeof sessionStorage !== 'undefined') {
00019|       sessionStorage.clear();
00020|       console.log('[CACHE-CLEAR] sessionStorage cleared');
00021|     }
00022|   } catch (e) {
00023|     console.warn('[CACHE-CLEAR] sessionStorage clear failed:', e);
00024|   }
00025|   
00026|   // Clear all caches
00027|   if ('caches' in window) {
00028|     caches.keys().then(function(cacheNames) {
00029|       console.log('[CACHE-CLEAR] Found caches:', cacheNames);
00030|       return Promise.all(
00031|         cacheNames.map(function(cacheName) {
00032|           console.log('[CACHE-CLEAR] Deleting cache:', cacheName);
00033|           return caches.delete(cacheName);
00034|         })
00035|       );
00036|     }).then(function() {
00037|       console.log('[CACHE-CLEAR] All caches cleared');
00038|     }).catch(function(error) {
00039|       console.warn('[CACHE-CLEAR] Cache clearing failed:', error);
00040|     });
00041|   }
00042|   
00043|   // Unregister all service workers
00044|   if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
00045|     navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations().then(function(registrations) {
00046|       console.log('[CACHE-CLEAR] Found service workers:', registrations.length);
00047|       return Promise.all(
00048|         registrations.map(function(registration) {
00049|           console.log('[CACHE-CLEAR] Unregistering SW:', registration.scope);
00050|           return registration.unregister();
00051|         })
00052|       );
00053|     }).then(function() {
00054|       console.log('[CACHE-CLEAR] All service workers unregistered');
00055|     }).catch(function(error) {
00056|       console.warn('[CACHE-CLEAR] SW unregistration failed:', error);
00057|     });
00058|   }
00059|   
00060|   console.log('[CACHE-CLEAR] Cache clearing completed');
00061| })();
</file>
state.title: public/clear-dev-cache.js
